Regulation Name(s): Calculator/Data Processing Module for Clinical Use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OMNIS Health Embrace EVO BGMS Meter
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Health2Sync Mobile Application and Smart Cable for uploading, viewing, and managing blood glucose data from compatible meters via iOS devices
Indications for Use Summary: Intended to aid people with diabetes and healthcare professionals in reviewing, analyzing, and evaluating blood glucose results to support diabetes management; allows blood glucose data upload from compatible meters to Health2Sync Mobile Application on iOS platform; not intended for treatment decisions or to substitute for professional healthcare advice
